projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Full-stack development with modern architectures, REST APIs and relational databases.
projects.alojarg.title: üè® AlojARG
projects.alojarg.subtitle: Booking System
projects.alojarg.description:
Seminar Integration Project: Complete system for managing and booking tourist accommodations in Argentina, developed as a final career project.
Technologies: .NET 9, Angular 20, TypeScript, MySQL, under Clean Architecture to keep code modular and scalable.
Key Features: RESTful API with JWT authentication and FluentValidation, integration with external hotel API (Makcorps), advanced search with dynamic filters, favorites system, property comparator and administrative dashboard.
Tools: Entity Framework Core for ORM, Swagger/OpenAPI for documentation, Docker Compose for container deployment.
This project strengthened knowledge in full stack development, scalable architecture and software engineering best practices.
projects.libros.title: üìö BookCode
projects.libros.subtitle: Book Management System
projects.libros.description:
Software Development Project: BookCode is a complete full stack web system for book management and reviews, designed to provide an interactive and personalized user experience.
Technologies: Frontend with React, HTML and CSS; Backend with Node.js, Express and TypeScript; MySQL database with MikroORM ORM.
Functionalities: Multiple CRUD for users, books, authors, categories, publishers and sagas; review system with ratings and comments; personalized lists ("Read", "Pending", "See later"); personalized recommendations and review reactions.
Features: Secure authentication with JWT tokens, review moderation through external API for bad word detection, complex dependent relationships between entities, user activity tracking.
Project that included database design and normalization, modular backend construction, external API integration and Git/GitHub management.
projects.stock.title: üì¶ Stock Management
projects.stock.description:
Software Development Project: Full stack stock management prototype, developed as an initial subject project to apply learned concepts.
Technologies: Frontend with React and TailwindCSS for modern UI; Backend with Node.js, Express and TypeScript; MySQL database integrated with Prisma ORM.
Functionalities: Complete CRUD of products and categories with dynamic filtering, real-time inventory control for accurate stock tracking.
Features: Complete database design and normalization, modular backend construction in TypeScript, Express server configuration, smooth Prisma integration for data operations.
This first full stack project consolidated knowledge in web development, application architecture and programming best practices.
Reference Contact: Eva Bellini, Cell: (54) 341 323 4724
projects.hospital.title: üè• Hospital System
projects.hospital.description:
Algorithms and Data Structures Project: Functional program for hospital management developed in the algorithms subject, applying data structures for efficient information handling.
Technologies: Developed mainly in Python with Pascal complements, using algorithms and data structures to optimize operations.
Functionalities: Complete patient registration with detailed information, efficient search by various criteria, management of associated diseases and symptoms.
Features: Updatable and organized database that allows adding new diseases with their symptoms, ensuring a flexible system for clinical information management.
This academic project consolidated knowledge in algorithms and data structures, applying them in a practical context of medical data management.
